name: BookIt
description: This project is still under development. The goal is to create an application that will simplify scheduling, payments, and website creation for local bands and artists!

name: Honeypot
description: An online party game that uses Webhooks! Users can create a game room and invite friends to join. Players will then answer prompts and take turns trying to match players to their answers.

name: Community Discord Bot
description: Created a custom discord bot that serves as a management and entertainment tool for over 300 people in a Twitch community. Features include automatic role assigment, queue system, custom welcome messages, and role assigment based upon user reactions.

name: Pediatrics Office Website
description: Designed and built an original website for a local pediatric practice. The website features information on both of their locations, services, staff and medical education documents.
